episode.description: NHK WORLD-JAPAN broadcasts GRAND SUMO November Tournament Day 8 action live from the Kokugikan in Tokyo, as top wrestlers reach the halfway point of the 15-day contest on Nov. 15.
episode.subtitle: November Tournament Day 8 (Halfway Point)
episode.title: GRAND SUMO LIVE

episode.description: NHK WORLD-JAPAN broadcasts GRAND SUMO January Tournament Opening Day action live from the Kokugikan Sumo Stadium in Ryogoku, Tokyo, as the top wrestlers have their first bouts of 2021.
